Title: Provides for a partial real property tax exemption for the water filtration plant for the City of Newburgh, Orange County, New York
Summary: Provides for a partial real property tax exemption for the water filtration plant for the City of Newburgh, Orange County, New York.
ActClause: AN ACT providing for a partial real property tax exemption for the water filtration plant for the City of Newburgh, Orange County, New York
